location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to William Hornby, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from John Beaumont and George Green at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged with sections of paper missing, but the text remains complete and is unaffected.

mods.abstract: Letter gives details of recent sales and reports the death of Shaikh Mahomet, one of the Factory seepoys and his replacement with another of the same name by the Bussora [Basra] Council.
